Package com.coursework.cw1dms.ControllerClasses

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.coursework.cw1dms.ControllerClasses.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class is used as a controller for the fxml file: Menu.fxml
Author:
Chun Hong Boey-modified

    Method used for finding the Specific mp4 file, and playing it when Button play is activated, mp4 file is repeated when it reaches the end of the video.

    Method used to change the Value "N" of the GameScene.java, this is to create new Levels for the game
    void
    switchScenes(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Method used to switch scenes from Main Menu(Menu.fxml) to the GameScene, and this can only be done iff a radioButton is selected.
